title: Hackathon Ficohsa 2021
desc: Winners of the challenge 'TVC - Directorio En Línea Para PyMEs'
Working on a five members team in which we were four programmers and one marketing
Developed a web app using NextJs, Firebase and Tailwindcss for small and medium size entrepreneurs in Honduras to connect them with their clients

The challenge prize was a media tour of 4 interviews in the programs: Hoy Hoy Estelar, Las Mañanas del 5, La Tarde, TN5 Matutino and Reportage en Tu Nota + $ 500 in cloud credits sponsored by Oracle for Startups.
Hackathon sponsors were Ficohsa Bank, Oracle, Tech4DevHN and Televicentro

refs.desc: Ficohsa Bank official account winners publication
One of the interviews recorded on YouTube

title: CELTI Latam
desc: Team Lead in charge of developing CELTI's Landing Page
Working remotely with other engineers from Mexico, Guatemala and Nicaragua
Used NextJs and Tailwindcss to develop the Landing Page
Participation as public moderator for two conferences
Event made by students for anyone interested in technology all around Latin America

refs.desc: YouTube Link to live conference recorded
